code: import React from'react';import avatar from'../images/img_avatar2.png';function SidebarInfo(props){return React.createElement("div",null,props.userAccount.map(function(userAccount){var username=userAccount.username;var accType=userAccount.admin_type;var code=userAccount.dwelling_code;var logged_in=userAccount.logged_in;function accountType(){if(accType==="SA"){return React.createElement("div",null,"Super-Admin");}else if(accType==="A"){return React.createElement("div",null,"Admin");}else if(accType==="NA"){return React.createElement("div",null,"Non-Admin");}}if(code==="ABC-XYZ"){if(logged_in===true){return React.createElement(React.Fragment,null,React.createElement("img",{src:avatar,alt:"Avatar",className:"avatar"}),React.createElement("p",{className:"sidebar-name",key:userAccount.username},username),React.createElement("p",{className:"sidebar-name",key:userAccount.admin_type},accountType()));}}}));}export default SidebarInfo;
